docs.snippet: Rescuers from the Coast Guard and Navy were searching for the crew members of two Marine Corps helicopters that collided during a nighttime training mission over Hawaii on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rescuers from the Coast Guard and Navy were searching for the crew members of two Marine Corps helicopters that collided during a nighttime training mission over Hawaii on Thursday.

headline.main: 'Idol' Stars Sound Unconvinced This Will Be Last Season

headline.main: 'Cake Boss' Star's Restaurant Is Denied Bid for Roof Sign

headline.main: Officer Gets 2-Week Suspension for Traffic Stop Behavior
headline.print_headline: Officer Gets 2-Week Suspension for Traffic Stop Behavior

docs.snippet: A white suburban Atlanta police officer shown on video telling a black driver "I don't care about your people" has been suspended without pay for two weeks, according to a police department memo released Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A white suburban Atlanta police officer shown on video telling a black driver "I don't care about your people" has been suspended without pay for two weeks, according to a police department memo released Friday.

headline.main: Jones Hit With $28,940 Amid Flurry of League Fines
headline.print_headline: Jones Hit With $28,940 Amid Flurry of League Fines

docs.snippet: The National Football League dished out six more fines on Friday stemming from the ill-tempered AFC Wild Card game between Cincinnati and Pittsburgh last week, with Bengals cornerback Adam "Pacman" Jones incurring the heaviest....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Football League dished out six more fines on Friday stemming from the ill-tempered AFC Wild Card game between Cincinnati and Pittsburgh last week, with Bengals cornerback Adam "Pacman" Jones incurring the heaviest.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: Coal Suspension Affects 30-Plus Mining Projects
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Coal Suspension Affects 30-Plus Mining Projects

docs.snippet: At least 30 applications from companies seeking to mine hundreds of millions of tons of coal face suspension as the government reviews its sales of the fuel from public lands, U.S. officials disclosed Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: At least 30 applications from companies seeking to mine hundreds of millions of tons of coal face suspension as the government reviews its sales of the fuel from public lands, U.S. officials disclosed Friday.

headline.main: Flight Attendant, Passengers Hurt When Jet Hits Turbulence
headline.print_headline: Flight Attendant, Passengers Hurt When Jet Hits Turbulence

docs.snippet: A flight attendant has been hospitalized and five passengers suffered apparently minor injuries after an American Airlines jet ran into turbulence over Florida....
docs.lead_paragraph: A flight attendant has been hospitalized and five passengers suffered apparently minor injuries after an American Airlines jet ran into turbulence over Florida.

headline.main: Suspected Islamist Fighters Take Hostages in Burkina Hotel Attack
headline.print_headline: Suspected Islamist Fighters Take Hostages in Burkina Hotel Attack

docs.snippet: Suspected Islamist fighters took an unknown number of hostages after attacking a hotel and casino in Burkina Faso's capital Ouagadougou late on Friday, a senior official with the national gendarmes said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suspected Islamist fighters took an unknown number of hostages after attacking a hotel and casino in Burkina Faso's capital Ouagadougou late on Friday, a senior official with the national gendarmes said.

headline.main: Immigration Lawyer Pleads Guilty in Forged Document Case
headline.print_headline: Immigration Lawyer Pleads Guilty in Forged Document Case

docs.snippet: A former U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement attorney pleaded guilty Friday after prosecutors said he forged a document to make it look like a Mexican citizen who wanted to stay in the U.S. was not eligible to do so....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement attorney pleaded guilty Friday after prosecutors said he forged a document to make it look like a Mexican citizen who wanted to stay in the U.S. was not eligible to do so.
